message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. With 80% of my products being high-quality, I'm confident you'll love it. This product has been carefully crafted to meet the highest standards. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm not willing to negotiate. What do you say? Will you take it home?
I trust the quality based on your description and am willing to make the purchase at the offered price.

Despite that, I still think it has some value and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. I'm not trying to hide anything, and I'm confident that you'll be happy with your purchase. Thank you for your transparency, Alice. Given the high-quality track record and the price you're offering, I'm willing to take the risk and purchase the product.
